meanings.definition: To act or behave toward someone in a specified way.
meanings.sent1: She will treat her friends with kindness.
meanings.sent2: He likes to treat his family with respect.
meanings.sent3: The cat treats the mouse like a toy.
meanings.sent4: The sun treats the flowers to its warm rays.
meanings.sent5: In the story, the wizard treats the hero with magic powers.

meanings.definition: An event or item that is out of the ordinary and gives great pleasure.
meanings.sent1: Ice cream is a delicious treat on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: Going to the movies is always a fun treat.
meanings.sent3: The surprise party was a delightful treat for the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: The vacation was a much-needed treat after a long year of work.
meanings.sent5: The concert was a musical treat for the audience.
